name: rhythmically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has a regular, repeated movement or beat: Try to breathe deeply and rhythmically. The group rhythmically chanted, "No more cuts!" See
rhythmic
More examplesFewer examplesThe baby was breathing rhythmically.She had a rhythmically charged performance style.The van's lights were flashing and the horn was beeping rhythmically.
